arts.ttl: Pulisic injured after Pochettino’s decision to start him vs Australia – Milan in trouble
arts.sum: Christian Pulisic suffered an injury around 26th minute of the USMNT's friendly match against Australia. The American forward of AC Milan, formerly of Borussia Dortmund and Chelsea, was forced off the field. Pulisic appeared to struggle throughout the game until he got hurt, and Pochettino’s decision to start him is highly questionable. This has left […]

arts.ttl: Christian Pulisic Suffers Concerning Injury Against Australia Ending USMNT Camp Early
arts.sum: U.S. men’s national team star Christian Pulisic was substituted 28 minutes in the World Cup host nation’s October friendly against Australia with an apparent lower leg injury. Fans anxiously wait until after the game for an update from Pochettino regarding his star’s fitness, but it’s a sour end to the international break for Pulisic.

arts.ttl: USMNT Player Ratings vs. Australia: Starting Striker Battle Heats Up
arts.sum: The U.S. men’s national team defeated Australia to close the October international window thanks to two goals from Coventry City striker Haji Wright. Both Wright and Folarin Balogun stood out this window as the battle for the starting striker job in 2026 heats up.

arts.ttl: Wright scores twice as US rallies to beat Australia 2-1 in friendly as Pulisic leaves with injury
arts.sum: Haji Wright scored in the 33rd and 51st minutes off passes from Cristian Roldan, and the United States rallied to beat Australia 2-1 on Tuesday to end the Socceroos’ 12-game unbeaten streak on a night Christian Pulisic left the game because of an injury. Roldan slid a through ball to Wright, who took a touch with his left foot and with his right lifted the ball over goalkeeper Mathew Ryan from about 10 yards.

arts.ttl: Haji Wright scores twice as USA come back from a goal down to see off Australia
arts.sum: World Cup 2026 cohosts defeat Socceroos 2-1 in Colorado USA captain Christian Pulisic injured; Jordan Bos opens scoring USA captain Christian Pulisic was forced off early with a lower leg complaint as the World Cup cohosts scrapped to a 2-1 win over Australia at Dick’s Sporting Goods Stadium in Colorado on Wednesday. A double from striker Haji Wright cancelled out a shock opening goal from Socceroos left-back Jordy Bos, handing Tony Popovic his first loss and denying Australia the chance to climb the Fifa rankings and potentially face an easier group at next year’s tournament. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: USA v Australia: men’s international football friendly – live updates
arts.sum: USMNT host Socceroos in Commerce City, Colorado Reach out to Alexander on Bluesky or email him 1 min: We are underway! After the Australian national anthem and an, uh, interesting rendition of the US counterpart, we are all set to go. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Christian Pulisic might be available and Antonee Robinson ruled out for US-Australia friendly
arts.sum: “Antonee is from the beginning of the camp, he’s with some small issue in his knee, pain, a little bit pain,” Pochettino said. Christian Pulisic may be available for the United States’ friendly against Australia on Tuesday night but Antonee Robinson won’t play because of pain in his surgically repaired right knee.

arts.ttl: Where to watch USMNT vs Australia: TV channel, live stream for friendly ahead of 2026 World Cup
arts.sum: United States and Australia clash this week to continue preparations for the 2026 World Cup. Gregg Berhalter will lead the USMNT to reinforce the key points in his squad and improve step by step, as the nation he leads will be one of the three hosts in the next international mega cup. Australia will also continue their warm-up matches when they face the United States, also away from home.
